name: Virtu Financial, Inc.
description: Virtu Financial, Inc. is a leading technology-enabled market maker and trading firm that specializes in providing liquidity across a variety of financial markets and asset classes. Founded in 2008 by Vincent Viola and Doug Cifu, Virtu utilizes cutting-edge technology to execute trades at high speeds and with high efficiency, playing a crucial role in maintaining market stability and transparency. The company operates in multiple asset classes, including equities, fixed income, currencies, and commodities, employing advanced algorithms and analytics to optimize trading performance. Virtu's mission is to enhance the overall efficiency of the financial markets by delivering best execution and liquidity solutions to its customers. The firm is dedicated to leveraging its proprietary technology to innovate and adapt in the fast-paced trading environment, ensuring that it meets the evolving needs of institutional clients and retail investors alike. With a focus on compliance and risk management, Virtu continues to uphold the highest standards of regulatory practices while contributing to the development of fair and orderly markets. Its commitment to excellence and integrity has established Virtu as a trusted partner in the global financial community.
